sp_angular_provider.name: kbCategory

sys_update_version.name: sp_angular_provider_ba1cfd88dbd1dc905c11639014961971
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>kbCategory</name><script><![CDATA[function($rootScope) {
	var categoryID = false;
	var secondCategory = false;
	var thirdCategory = false;

	function setCategoryID(catID) {
		categoryID = catID;
	}

	function setSecondCat(catID, secondCat){
		categoryID = catID;
		secondCategory = secondCat;
		$rootScope.$broadcast("openKBCategory");
	}

	function setThirdCat(secondCat, thirdCat){
		secondCategory = secondCat;
		thirdCategory = thirdCat;
		$rootScope.$broadcast("openThirdCategory");
	}
	
	function getCategoryID(){
		return categoryID;
	}

	function getSecondCat(){
		return secondCategory;
	}

	function getThirdCat(){
		return thirdCategory;
	}

	return {
		setCategoryID: setCategoryID,
		setSecondCat: setSecondCat,
		setThirdCat: setThirdCat,
		getCategoryID : getCategoryID,
		getSecondCat: getSecondCat,
		getThirdCat: getThirdCat
	};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>organize.henrique</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-06-04 19:30:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>ba1cfd88dbd1dc905c11639014961971</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>kbCategory</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITSM Service Portal" source="x_gmeps_itsm_servi">334ae627dbc85c105c1163901496192f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITSM Service Portal">334ae627dbc85c105c1163901496192f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_ba1cfd88dbd1dc905c11639014961971</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>organize.henrique</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-06-05 16:20:06</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>
